title: My Favorite Deals from Prime Big Deals Days You Can Still Get
description: If you forgot to grab anything during Prime Day in July, no worries! Amazon just launched its latest sales even called Prime Big Deals Days from Tuesday, October 8 to Wednesday, October 9. I’ve already seen so many great deals on everything from cookware for the holidays to my cookbooks. I also found some great […]
author: Gina
excerpt: Amazon Prime Big Deals Days has a ton of deals on my favorite cooking gadgets and even my cookbooks. Here are my top picks.
text: This post may contain affiliate links. Read my disclosure policy.Credit: Amazon If you forgot to grab anything during Prime Day in July, no worries! Amazon just launched its latest sales even called Prime Big Deals Days from Tuesday, October 8 to Wednesday, October 9. I’ve already seen so many great deals on everything from cookware for the holidays to my cookbooks. I also found some great deals from KitchenAid, Vitamix, and more! Plus, I’ll be updating this post as new deals pop up! Just make sure you’re a Prime member so you can shop the sale (you can get a free 30-day trial, too!). Below, you’ll find my absolute favorite deals from the sale, as well as other great competing sales I saw at some of my other favorite brands. Happy shopping! 1. Farberware Bakers Advantage Ceramic Pie Dish If you’re planning to make a pie or two for Thanksgiving, you’re going to need a durable pie dish. This pretty ceramic one has scalloped edges and is currently 20% off! 2. Skinnytaste Simple Credit: Amazon Anytime my cookbooks are on sale I love to share them with you guys! Currently, you can get three of them for their lowest prices thanks to Prime Big Deals Days, including my newest cookbook Skinnytaste Simple. You can also find Skinnytaste Fast and Slow and Skinnytaste Air Fryer Dinners on sale. Get Skinnytaste Simple: Get Skinnytaste Fast and Slow: Get Skinnytaste Air Fryer Dinners: 3. Evo 18/8 Stainless Steel Oil Sprayer   Credit: Amazon I love using an oil sprayer when cooking because it allows me to control the amount of oil you use and you can use your favorite brand of oil. Evo makes my favorite one—and this stainless steel version is more durable and it’s currently 20% off if you clip the on-page coupon. 4. Nespresso Vertuo Pop+ Deluxe Credit: Amazon I love my Nespresso for my morning coffee! There are so many great flavors in the different pods, and the Vertuo Pop+ Deluxe model allows you the craft 5-, 8-, and 12-ounce coffees that are either hot or iced. Right now, it’s $70 off, which is a steal for an at-home barista. 5. Koackl Sourdough Bread Baking Supplies Credit: Amazon I’ve recently gotten into sourdough bread making and if you’d like to join me this fall, these bread tools would be helpful. It comes with a banneton basket, cloth liners, dough scrapers, a dough whisk, a dough cutter, and a bread Lame—and all for under $10! Vitamix Explorian Blender – $269.95 at Amazon (Originally $382.99): This is a great price on a Vitamix. html:
This post may contain affiliate links. Read my disclosure policy.

If you forgot to grab anything during Prime Day in July, no worries! Amazon just launched its latest sales even called Prime Big Deals Days from Tuesday, October 8 to Wednesday, October 9. I’ve already seen so many great deals on everything from cookware for the holidays to my cookbooks. I also found some great deals from KitchenAid, Vitamix, and more! Plus, I’ll be updating this post as new deals pop up!

Just make sure you’re a Prime member so you can shop the sale (you can get a free 30-day trial, too!). Below, you’ll find my absolute favorite deals from the sale, as well as other great competing sales I saw at some of my other favorite brands. Happy shopping!

1. Farberware Bakers Advantage Ceramic Pie Dish

If you’re planning to make a pie or two for Thanksgiving, you’re going to need a durable pie dish. This pretty ceramic one has scalloped edges and is currently 20% off!

2. Skinnytaste Simple

Anytime my cookbooks are on sale I love to share them with you guys! Currently, you can get three of them for their lowest prices thanks to Prime Big Deals Days, including my newest cookbook Skinnytaste Simple. You can also find Skinnytaste Fast and Slow and Skinnytaste Air Fryer Dinners on sale.

Get Skinnytaste Simple:

Get Skinnytaste Fast and Slow:

Get Skinnytaste Air Fryer Dinners:

3. Evo 18/8 Stainless Steel Oil Sprayer  

I love using an oil sprayer when cooking because it allows me to control the amount of oil you use and you can use your favorite brand of oil. Evo makes my favorite one—and this stainless steel version is more durable and it’s currently 20% off if you clip the on-page coupon.

4. Nespresso Vertuo Pop+ Deluxe

I love my Nespresso for my morning coffee! There are so many great flavors in the different pods, and the Vertuo Pop+ Deluxe model allows you the craft 5-, 8-, and 12-ounce coffees that are either hot or iced. Right now, it’s $70 off, which is a steal for an at-home barista.

5. Koackl Sourdough Bread Baking Supplies

I’ve recently gotten into sourdough bread making and if you’d like to join me this fall, these bread tools would be helpful. It comes with a banneton basket, cloth liners, dough scrapers, a dough whisk, a dough cutter, and a bread Lame—and all for under $10!

Prime Big Deals Days Kitchen Deals I Love

  • Breville Food Processor – $299.95 at Amazon (Originally $374.99)
  • Breville the Smart Oven – $187.46 at Amazon (Originally $269.95): This toaster oven acts like a small oven!
  • Crock-Pot 6 Quart Cook & Carry – $55.99 at Amazon (Originally $69.99 Perfect for cozy soups and roasts.
  • DASH Rapid Egg Cooker – $15.99 at Amazon (Originally $18.99): You can save up room on the stovetop to make hard-boiled eggs with this viral egg cooker is a must.
  • DASH Tasti-Crisp Electric Air Fryer Oven – My favorite budget air fryer is even cheaper!
  • Etekcity Food Kitchen Scale – $9.99 at Amazon (Originally $13.99): This is great for measuring ingredients for baking.
  • KitchenAid Artisan Stand Mixer – $349.95 at Amazon (Originally $449.99): My KitchenAid stand mixer is one of my most used gadgets, especially with all my upcoming fall baking and bread making.
  • KitchenAid Spiralizer Plus Attachment – $99.96 at Amazon (Originally $129.99)
  • Ninja Air Fryer – $79.94 at Amazon (Originally $129.99)
  • Oster Cordless Electric Wine Bottle Opener – This will be so useful for the holidays
  • OXO Good Grips V-Blade Mandoline Slicer – $39.25 at Amazon (Originally $45.95): This is the mandoline slicer I own and love.
  • Pyrex Deep 9×13-Inch Glass Baking Dish – $20.99 at Amazon (Originally $24.99): This deep dish is perfect for casseroles for a crowd.
  • Vitamix Explorian Blender – $269.95 at Amazon (Originally $382.99): This is a great price on a Vitamix.

Other Prime Big Deals Days Home and Organizing Deals I Love

  • ELEMIS Pro-Collagen Marine Cream – $119 at Amazon (Originally $140): My favorite moisturizer is $20 off.
  • Anchor Hocking Glass Jar – $20.99 at Amazon (Originally ($29.99): These are great for storing grains and other dry goods.
  • Pyrex 24-Piece Glass Clear Storage Set – $38.49 at Amazon (Originally $47.29): I use these for food storage.
  • Stasher Platinum Reusable Storage Bag – $16.71 at Amazon (Originally $29.99): Love that these stand up in the fridge.
  • Stasher Premium Food Storage Bags, 7-Pack – $73.49 at Amazon (Originally $104.99): Get a whole set of my favorite reusable bags!
  • SpaceAid Bag Storage Organizer – $23.98 at Amazon (Originally $39.98): Good for storing ziplock bags.
  • BISSELL Little Green Multi-Purpose Cleaner – $99.59 at Amazon (Originally $123.59): This viral deep cleaner is on sale!

Other Sales at Retailers I Love

  • Target: Shop Target Circle Week through Saturday, October 12 and snag discounts on all-things home, electronics, clothing, and more.
  • Walmart: Grab deals at up to 50% off at Walmart’s Holiday Deals Event.

Prices were accurate at time of publishing.

Categories:
